__e: John... I haven't been in a long-term relationship in six years, and for a dollar above minimum wage I am answering phones and bringing coffee to people with real lives.
Now listen. I walk around the neighborhood in the evenings... and look the girls over in the cafes... the way that some nuns do while collecting alms.
I'm gonna get us all coffees 'cause we got a lot of work to do, you know?
Well, um... maybe you guys can go grab some coffee and come back, because there's one other place I need you to check.
Well, you know what I was doing while you were sitting at cafes and sleeping with your Hollywood starlet?
I got coffee and papers... but I think the more pressing question is, what have you been doing?
Look, can I just have my coffee, please?
Could we have the two coffees, please?
Can we get our coffees, please?
Can we get our coffees, please?
